power.title: Adaptive Stratagem
power.fluff: Your companion has the ability and the will, and you provide the plan and the motivation

section.name: Target:
section.text: One ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, the target ally gains his or her choice of one of the following two benefits:
► A power bonus to damage rolls equal to your Intelligence modifier or your Wisdom modifier.
► A power bonus to saving throws equal to your Wisdom modifier or your Charisma modifier.

power.title: Aid the Injured
power.fluff: Your presence is both a comfort and an inspiration to an ally

section.name: Target:
section.text: You or one ally

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.
If the target ally is prone, he or she can stand up without spending an action.

power.title: Covering Maneuver
power.fluff: Responding to your expertise, one ally steps in to cover another's recovery

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You or an ally in your warlord's aura uses second wind

section.name: Target:
section.text: The triggering character, and one other ally in your warlord's aura

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The second ally can shift 2 squares as a free interrupt, and then marks one enemy either adjacent to him or her, or in your warlord's aura.
Until the start of his or her next turn, the triggering character has a +2 power bonus to all defenses against the marked enemy.

power.title: Crescendo of Violence
power.fluff: When one of your allies delivers a telling blow on a foe, you offer encouragement to help your friend keep fighting

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An ally in your warlord's aura scores a critical hit

section.name: Target:
section.text: The triggering ally

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target gains temporary hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier or your Charisma modifier.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Equal to 5 + your Wisdom modifier or your Charisma modifier.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Equal to 10 + your Wisdom modifier or your Charisma modifier.

power.title: Cunning Adjustment
power.fluff: You spot an opening that can be seized to gain an advantage

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You hit an enemy with a melee attack, or the target ally of your tactician's command hits an enemy with a melee attack

section.name: Target:
section.text: You if you are adjacent to the triggering ally, or an ally adjacent to the triggering character

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target can shift 3 squares as a free reaction, and gains combat advantage against the enemy that was hit by the triggering attack. The combat advantage lasts until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Encouraging Boost
power.fluff: You shout words of encouragement, giving your ally a necessary boost

section.name: Target:
section.text: One ally in your warlord's aura

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target can use his or her second wind as a free reaction.
If you have hit an enemy with an attack this turn, the target regains additional hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier or your Charisma modifier.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Equal to 4 + your Wisdom modifier or your Charisma modifier.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Equal to 8 + your Wisdom modifier or your Charisma modifier.

power.title: Flash of Insight
power.fluff: Your weapon slips past a foe's guard, allowing you to adjust your attack and throw the creature off balance

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You hit an enemy with a Weapon attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You either knock the triggering enemy prone, or push it a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier or your Wisdom modifier.
